prompt: A photorealistic portrait of a middle-aged woman with brown skin, long hair, showing a clear awe facial expression (eyes wide in wonder), ultra-detailed RAW color photo, 85mm lens, shallow depth of field, studio portrait, highly detailed skin, pores visible, sharp eyes, soft key light, rim light, natural color grading, natural window light, high dynamic range, 8k master
